item.title: SONA as it played out on Twitter
item.dc:creator: Yolisa Tswanya
item.description:
If Twitter was the official record, then the 2016 State Of the Nation Address (SONA) would go down in history as one massive joke. Every single one of the top 10 tweets sent during SONA 2016 was a humorous crack at the President, the process of Parliament, or the sign language interpreter who unwittingly became […]

The post SONA as it played out on Twitter appeared first on Code for South Africa Data Journalism Academy.
